2.「フン。ほんとに アタイが見えてるのかい？: Hmm. Are you sure you can see me?

3.「そうよ～ なんといっても| わたくしの 一番弟子なんだもの。: That's right~ after all, you are my number one|disciple.

4.「<pc>さん。こちらの キャルさんから| あなたに お仕事の依頼がきてるのよ。: <pc>. Cal here has offered you a job.|So let's talk to her.

5.「どうやら 見えてるようだね……よかった。: Looks like you can see me...thank goodness.

6.「どいつも こいつも アタイのことを| 無視しやがるから クサクサしてたんだ。|:
I've been feeling a little crummy because|they've been ignoring me, just like that|sleepyhead over there. Like that sleepyhead|
|over there.

7.「まっ これが デスマスターと一般人の| ちがいってやつ なのかねぇ。: I guess this is the difference between death|masters and ordinary people.

8.「……依頼の話に移ろうか。アタイはさ| ここの そばにある墓地に 葬られたんだけ: Let's move on to the request. Me, I was buried|in a graveyard near here, but as you can see,|I'm a wandering ghost...

9.「心残りがあるせいで 現世にしばられて| いつまでも 昇天できなくてね。| それ: I'm stuck in this life because I have regrets|and I can't ascend. I want you to solve it.

10.「生前は 用心棒を なりわいにしていたんだけど| グレン領西で 行商人の護衛をや: Before his death, he was a bouncer by trade,|but when he was escorting a peddler in Glen|West, he was attacked by monsters...

11.「客を守るため 敵を引きつけ 奮闘したんだけど| あえなく 死んじまった……まっ:
He fought hard to protect his customers by|attracting the enemy, but he died in the|end... but that's just the way the business|
|is. I think.

12.「ただね 愛用の扇を かすめ取られたことだけは| いまだに くやしくってね……。: The only thing that still bothers me is the|fact that they took away my favorite fan... it|was the pride of my life as a martial artist!

13.「グレン領西の中央か 南西あたりにいる| ウィングデビルを仕留め アタイの扇を|: I need you to take out the Aggrosculpture in|the center or southwest of Glen West and get|me my fan back. Please! That's right!

14.「安心してくださいな。<pc>さんなら| きっと やりとげてくれます。| わたく: Don't worry. I am sure that <pc> will|make it. I give you my seal of approval.

15.「アタイは そろそろ ラクになりたいんだ。| 頼んだよ……<pc>。: Me, I want to be able to get laid.|Please...<pc>.

16.「ちょっと <pc>！| アンタ 誰と話してるのよ！？: Hey, <pc>! Who are you talking to?

17.「むっき～！ いいな いいなぁ。| ずるい！ ずーるーいー！: Mukki~! I like it. I like it. That's not|fair! That's not fair!

18.「アタシなんかさぁ ダーマ神官のとこ行っても| デスマスターに なれなかったんだ: I couldn't become a death master even if I|went to Priest Dharma!

19.「お前には 素質がない。デスマスターにとって| 欠くべからざる 霊感というものが: You have no qualities. You lack the monster of|inspiration that is essential for a death|master! And so they say...

20.「霊感ゼロとか ありえないじゃん もうッ！: How is it possible that he has no psychic|sense?

21.「もしもし 幽霊さん……今 そばにいる？| いたら 返事して。アタシの霊感を 証: Hello, ghost... are you around right now? If|you are, answer me. Prove that I'm psychic.

22.「あらあら まあまあ。お気の毒さまだけど| 霊感がないんじゃ どうしようもないわ: Oh, dear, oh, dear. I'm sorry to hear that,|but if you're not psychic, there's nothing we|can do about it.

23.「落ち込んでる ネリムちゃんが| 気になるだろうけど あなたは 初仕事を| 成功: I know you're probably wondering why Nelim is|down in the dumps, but you need to focus on|getting your first job done.

24.「えっ！ デズ師匠と いっしょに 幽霊さんと| 話してたの！？ アタシが 寝てる: Oh, my God! You and Master Des were talking to|a ghost? While I was sleeping?

26.「マジで？ 幽霊さん まだ そばにいるの！？: Really? The ghost is still around?
